content: - i want my designs to stand out not only for their simple classic lines but also for the well written and illustrated pattern i hope you will let me know how it works out for you and let me know if you need any help i would really love to see photos this simple classic baby jacket in garter stitch is always a big hit with everyone babies love the comfortable fit and luxurious softness of the yarns and moms love the elegant look and stylish details the fit is comfortable giving you ease for fitting and baby lots of room for growing you will love knitting from the top down with no finishing other than sewing on the button and tucking in the ends you work the collar then yoke to the underarm and divide the sleeves from the body each is worked separately in the round with no sewing or finishing except to sew on the buttton when you wash and block **includes a bonus tutorial** fully illustrated stretchy cast off **skill level ** 2 easy **skills required ** this is an easy project for beginners you will need to know how to do knit and purl stitches as well as yarn over knitting on 4 double pointed needles for the no sew sleeves is optional **sizes** 0-6 months 9-12 months 18-24 months **finished measurements** finished chest 21 23 25 body length 9 5 10 2 10 9 sleeve length 6 6 5 7 this garment is designed with lots of ease for an easy fit and longer wear **materials** **yarn ** nancy elizabeth designs - ** handspun merino & silk dk 1 ** weight or **handspun merino and angora** 2 55 yards per 1 oz 28 gram skein 5 6 6 1 oz skeins or choose another dk or light worsted weight yarn that will give you the correct gauge **needles ** 4mm us 6 straight or circular whichever is most comfortable as we will be knitting back and forth set of 4 double points in same size 4mm us 6 or size you need to get the correct gauge **notions ** 1 focal point button **gauge** garter stitch over 4 in 10 cm = 18 0 sts by 34 0 row 1 http //www nancyelizabethdesigns com/product/handspun-merino-silk-yarn/ 2 http //www nancyelizabethdesigns com/product/handspun-merino-angora-yarn/
